actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1331(c) of title 10, United States Code, to authorize the granting of retired pay to persons otherwise qualified for such pay who were members of the Reserve forces prior to August 16, 1945, if such persons served on active duty during the Vietnam conflict.

summary.text: Authorizes the granting of retired pay to persons otherwise qualified for such pay who were members of the Reserve Forces prior to August 16, 1945, if such persons served on active duty during the Vietnam conflict. (August 4, 1964 to January 28, 1973) (Amends 10 U.S.C. 1331(c))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1331(c) of title 10, United States Code, to authorize the granting of retired pay to persons otherwise qualified for such pay who were members of the Reserve forces prior to August 16, 1945, if such persons served on active duty during the Vietnam conflict.
